This win extended India's perfect ODI record against Pakistan, despite Sidra Amin's valiant 81.

Chicago's ICE operations, dubbed "gestapo tactics," involved chemical irritants against protesters, while a federal judge blocked Trump's National Guard deployment in Portland, citing false "war-ravaged" claims. These events underscore deepening political rifts, with dissenters labeled "left-wing terrorists" and officials facing removal for defying the administration.

This unusual incident saw no claim of responsibility from the PLA, leading to arrests of 15 members. Authorities are probing potential political support amidst ongoing ethnic tensions.

description: India and the UK commenced their major `Konkan` naval exercise in the western Indian Ocean, deploying aircraft carriers, warships, and fighters. Led by INS Vikrant and HMS Prince of Wales, the biennial drills aim to enhance interoperability and reinforce a free and open Indo-Pacific, ahead of British PM Keir Starmer’s visit. This exercise strengthens strategic ties and regional maritime stability.

title: Mount Everest blizzard: Nearly 1k trapped on Tibetan side; rescue ops on
description: A severe blizzard has left nearly 1,000 stranded on Mount Everest's Tibetan side, with rescue efforts underway amid heavy snowfall. Concurrently, devastating rains in Nepal triggered landslides and flash floods, causing at least 47 deaths and leaving nine missing. Authorities in both regions are intensifying relief operations to reach affected communities and stranded visitors.

Insider: Oilers owner Daryl Katz’s impatience clouds McDavid’s future
description: Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid's contract uncertainty is causing significant unease within the franchise as he enters his final year. Owner Daryl Katz is reportedly "antsy" over the delay, despite no animosity. NHL insider Darren Dreger suggests a 50-50 chance of an extension, possibly a short-term deal, leaving the team's future in McDavid's hands.

description: Jeff Bezos predicted millions will live in space within decades, choosing orbital habitats supported by robots and AI data centers. He also envisioned gigawatt-scale space data centers within 10-20 years, leveraging continuous solar power to surpass terrestrial facilities. Bezos called the current AI investment surge a "good" industrial bubble.

Darjeeling landslides: Homes, bridge, roads, tea gardens washed out — scary visuals emerge from Bengal
description: Torrential rains have unleashed widespread devastation in Darjeeling, triggering massive landslides that claimed at least nine lives and isolated remote villages. Homes and tea gardens were buried, and a crucial bridge collapsed, disrupting transportation. Rescue efforts face challenging terrain and continuous rainfall. Authorities are monitoring the dire situation as IMD issued a red alert, urging expedited aid for affected communities.

description: Torrential rains have unleashed devastating landslides across Darjeeling and Kalimpong hills, claiming at least nine lives and leaving several missing. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on why he supports Trump's $100,000 H-1B Visa fee
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang supports President Trump's new $100,000 H-1B visa fee for fresh applications, calling it a "great start" to reshape immigration policy and attract the "brightest minds." He acknowledges the high cost but believes it sets a meaningful threshold. Critics, however, warn the move could lead to brain drain and undermine America's tech leadership.

Nepal hit by Monsoon: At least 51 dead in landslides, flood; evacuations under way
description: At least 51 people died in landslides and flooding in Ilam, Eastern Nepal, over the past 24 hours, with authorities expecting the death toll to rise. Security forces are evacuating residents in Kathmandu Valley as rivers swell. Several districts face high risk, and nearly two million people could be affected by the unexpected, renewed monsoon downpours.

Harvard trained gastroenterologist reveals 10 best foods for gas and bloating
description: Bloating occurs when excess air or gas buildup gets trapped in the digestive tract or when gut muscles fail to move food efficiently. This can be triggered by eating too fast and swallowing air, consuming gas-producing foods or food intolerances. The good news is that certain foods can actively soothe the digestive system by providing enzymes that break down food efficiently.

UP: Love story in 2023, skeletal remains in 2025 - How a wrong number ended in murder
description: A wrong number call blossomed into a secret affair, culminating in the murder of 30-year-old Sonam in Hardoi two years ago. Sonam, who pressured her married lover Maseedul to marry her, was killed by him, his brother, and father on August 8, 2023. Her skeleton was recovered from a well after two arrests, with Maseedul currently on the run.

title: 'Went to build better future': How robbery attempt claimed Indian student's life in US
description: A 28-year-old Hyderabad student, Pole Chandrasekhar, was fatally shot in Texas, US, on October 3 during a suspected armed robbery at his part-time gas station job. Chandrasekhar, who was pursuing a master's, died on the spot. Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy expressed condolences and assured government support to repatriate his remains, with coordination underway with Indian officials.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX wins contracts worth $714 million from Pentagon
description: The US Space Force awarded SpaceX five of seven critical military launch contracts totaling $714 million, reinforcing its dominance in Pentagon space missions. United Launch Alliance secured the remaining two missions for $428 million. Blue Origin's New Glenn rocket remains uncertified for these National Security Space Launch missions, missing out on this cycle's awards.

title: Hartenstein’s wife Kourtney steps back from glam life for heartfelt reason
description: Kourtney Hartenstein steps down as a ring girl after five years. She now dedicates her time to family, supporting NBA champion husband Isaiah Hartenstein and their young son. Hartenstein plans to attend Oklahoma City Thunder games this season. She also explores new work opportunities, including a family foundation. This marks a new chapter for her.
